title: Ep 50: DA BOGEYS 2.0
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
The brand is strong! The art is back! The Bronx's very own Desus Nice & THE KID MERO aka the Bodega Boys (from Viceland's Desus & Mero) are giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Recorded at Red Bull Studios in NYC.

This week: Bogey awards, Vashtie comes thru, Mero's kids are plotting on him, Skittles, Bolympics and more!

description:
The brand is strong! The art is back! The Bronx's very own Desus Nice & THE KID MERO aka the Bodega Boys (from Viceland's Desus & Mero) are giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Recorded at Red Bull Studios in NYC.

This week: Bogey awards, Vashtie comes thru, Mero's kids are plotting on him, Skittles, Bolympics and more!
